attributes.action: I would like the UK government to rejoin the EU ERASMUS scheme.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to renegotiate and rejoin ERASMUS, a scheme which has given so many opportunities to many thousands of students. Such opportunities  are now  possible only for the privileged few which is certainly not anyone's idea of a level playing field or social mobility.
attributes.background: The ERASMUS scheme for UK students allowed them to study in another EU country for a year. This was a reciprocal arrangement from which all countries benefited enabling an exchange of ideas and cultures. It  also gave UK academics a smooth path to visit and engage with colleagues in Europe.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330917
